name: Dodgy Laser!
description:
DODGY LASER!

Initially an Android app, I've fixed it up for a PC release just to have on my itch.io in case it's ever needed. 

Dodge the Red lines for as long as you can!

White -> Yellow -> Red

While the line is white or yellow it is not dangerous and you can move through it freely, once it turns red however you will die.

- Features -

Character Customisation with a bunch of different Player and Trail sprites to purchase and choose from.

Unity Ad implementation (which has been ripped out from this PC version).

Working Saving and Loading system.

Working Shop to purchase customisation from.

- Controls -

Left click and hold to bring the player to your cursor.

Left click to navigate the menu
